title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; simple API to chat, generate embeddings, list/pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, prompt templates, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot frontend that talks to your local Ollama instance over HTTP.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive (RxJava) APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and delete models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to build and run Ollama declaratively on NixOS or via nix-shell.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and example compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA/ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library used internally by the ollama CLI; exposes chat, pull, and generate APIs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers users’ questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Simple Slack bot that integrates Ollama models into channels via Socket-Mode.
